subtype.constraint.name: ap239_prdi_restrict_product_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Attachment_slot, Breakdown, Breakdown_element, Document, Interface_connector, Interface_specification, Part, Product_as_individual, Requirement)

subtype.constraint.name: ap239_prdi_restrict_product_version_subtype
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Attachment_slot_version, Breakdown_element_version, Breakdown_version, Document_version, Interface_connector_version, Interface_specification_version, Part_version, Product_as_individual_version, Requirement_version)

subtype.constraint.name: ap239_prdi_restrict_product_view_definition_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (Attachment_slot_definition, Breakdown_element_definition, Interface_connector_definition, Interface_specification_definition, Part_view_definition, Product_as_individual_view, Requirement_view_definition)
